name: Automata
desc: Automata gain a crystal when they deal damage. At @TriggerNumCrystals@ crystals, they blast their current target, dealing magic damage + <magicDamage>@ConversionDamagePct*100@%</magicDamage> of damage dealt since the previous blast and reset. They also gain Armor and Magic Resist.

name: Menaces
desc: Powder gains Dominator but no longer benefits from Family. When her monkey explodes, it creates @NumMonstrosities@ of Silco's monstrosities.

name: Sorcerer
desc: Your team gains @TeamAP@ Ability Power. Sorcerers gain more.
<row>(@MinUnits@) @BaseAP@ %i:scaleAP%, Abilities reduce their target's damage by @DamageDecrease*100@% for @DamageDecreaseDuration@ seconds</row>

name: Scrap
desc: Combat start: Components held by Scrap units temporarily turn into full items. Scrap units gain Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds for each component held by your team, including those that make up a full item.
<row>(@MinUnits@) All components, and full items become lucky! @HPShieldAmount@ Shield</row>

name: Artillerist
desc: Every @NumOfAttacks@ attacks, Artillerists launch a rocket that deals @PercentDamage*100@% Attack Damage around the target. They also gain Attack Damage.
<row>(@MinUnits@) @AD*100@% %i:scaleAD%, Launch a rocket every @NumOfAttacks@ attacks that deals double damage.</row>

name: Form Swapper
desc: Innate: Form Swappers change their stats and ability based on if they're placed in the front 2 rows or back 2 rows.
Frontline Form Swappers gain Durability. Backline Form Swappers gain Damage Amp.

name: Emissary
desc: This trait is active only when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Emissaries.
<row>(@MinUnits@) Gain all bonuses. Emissaries gain @BonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth% and @SelfishDamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%</row>

<TFTGuildActive enabled=TFT13_Trait_Ambassador_ActiveDomina alternate=TFTGuildInactive>Ambessa: Allies gain @AmbessaArmor@ Armor and Magic Resist for each opponent defeated. (@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT13_Ambassador_PlayersDefeated@/7)</TFTGuildActive>

<TFTGuildActive enabled=TFT13_Trait_Ambassador_ActiveJarvan alternate=TFTGuildInactive>Garen: On Combat Start, Garen and allies to his left and right gain @GarenHealthPercent*100@% of his max Health.</TFTGuildActive>
<TFTGuildActive enabled=TFT13_Trait_Ambassador_ActiveNami alternate=TFTGuildInactive>Nami: Allies' attacks grant @NamiMana@ bonus Mana.</TFTGuildActive>
<TFTGuildActive enabled=TFT13_Trait_Ambassador_ActiveTristana alternate=TFTGuildInactive>Tristana: Allies gain @StarAS*100@% Attack Speed per star level.</TFTGuildActive>

name: Martial Law
desc: When Ambessa casts, Caitlyn fires an empowered attack at the target, dealing @CaitAD*100@% damage. Ambessa gains @ADShare*100@% of Caitlyn's Attack Damage.

name: Sentinel
desc: Your team gains Armor and Magic Resist. Sentinels gain triple.

name: Reunion
desc: When Vi casts, Ekko releases 3 afterimages towards her target each dealing @EkkoAfterImageReducedDamage*100@% damage. When Ekko casts, Vi slams an earthquake towards his target dealing @ViEarthquakeReducedDamage*100@% damage.

name: Family
desc: Family members support each other, reducing their max Mana and gaining extra bonuses.
<row>(@MinUnits@) @ManaReduction*100@% reduction, heist on topside! After combat, progress the heist, increased for each surviving Family member!</row>

name: Ambusher
desc: Damage from Ambushers' Abilities can critically strike. They also gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and Critical Strike Damage.

name: Sisters
desc: When Jinx scores a takedown, Vi gains @ADBuff*100@% bonus Attack Damage for @ViDuration@ seconds. When Vi scores a takedown, Jinx gains @ASBuff*100@% bonus Attack Speed for @JinxDuration@ seconds.

name: Visionary
desc: Whenever Visionaries gain Mana, they gain more.
<row>(@MinUnits@) @EnlightenedBonusMana*100@% %i:scaleMana%, Abilities heal an ally for @AllyHealing*100@% of damage dealt</row>

name: Sniper
desc: Snipers deal more damage to targets farther away.

name: Conqueror
desc: Conquerors' takedowns grant stacks of Conquest. After gaining enough Conquest, open War Chests full of loot!
Conquerors gain Attack Damage and Ability Power, increased by @PercentIncreasePerChest*100@% for each War Chest opened.

name: High Roller
desc: When casting, Sevika rolls a random Jinx modification to her Ability and gains @Durability*100@% Durability for @Duration@ seconds.
-Rocket: Launch @Bonus1NumRockets@ rockets that deal @Bonus1RocketDamage@ physical damage each

name: Academy
desc: The Academy sponsors 3 items each game.
Copies of sponsored items grant bonus max Health and Damage Amp. Academy units holding sponsored items gain double the amount, plus an additional @BaseValues*100@% Health and Damage Amp.

name: Chem-Baron
desc: Gain Shimmer after each player combat. If your loss streak is at least @MinStreakLength@, gain more.
At each stack of @ShimmerBreakpoint@ Shimmer, the Black Market offers you contraband that only Chem-Barons can use. Chem-Barons gain max Health for each Black Market you pass on.

name: Rebel
desc: After your team loses @PercentHealthTrigger*100@% of their Health, a smoke signal appears, granting Rebels @BurstAS*100@% Attack Speed for @BurstDuration@ seconds and extra power for the rest of combat.
<row>(@MinUnits@) The smoke signal triggers at Combat Start and every @ForceDuration@ seconds.</row>

name: Dominator
desc: Combat start: Dominators gain a Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
When Dominators cast, they gain stacking Ability Power based on the Mana spent.

name: Pit Fighter
desc: Pit Fighters gain @OmnivampPercent*100@% Omnivamp and deal bonus true damage. Once per combat at @HealthThreshold*100@% Health, they heal a percentage of their max Health over @Duration@ seconds.

name: What Could Have Been
desc: Vander gains @TFTTrait.TFT13_Teamup_BloodBrothers.1:MaxHealthGainPerCast@ permanent max Health for each time Silco casts. Silco gains @TFTTrait.TFT13_Teamup_BloodBrothers.1:APGainPerDeath@ permanent Ability Power for each time Vander dies.

name: Enforcer
desc: Combat Start: Enforcers gain Shield and Damage Amp. The highest Health enemy units become WANTED!
When a Wanted enemy dies, Enforcers gain @AttackSpeedPerWantedKill*100@% Attack Speed.
<row>(@MinUnits@) ALL enemies; @PercentMaxHealthShield*100*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @BaseDA*100@% %i:scaleDA%; Combat Start: Confiscate all enemy items!</row>

name: Firelight
desc: Every @Duration@ seconds, Firelights dash. While dashing, they attack with infinite range and heal a percentage of the damage taken since their last dash.
<row>(@MinUnits@) @PercentDamageTakenHeal*100@% of damage taken. While dashing, gain a massive burst of Attack Speed.</row>

name: Unlikely Duo
desc: Jinx and Sevika gain @AD*100@% Attack Damage and @Health@ Health. Whenever one casts, they grant the other @Mana@ mana. Sevika's arm is luckier.

name: Experiment
desc: Gain Laboratory hexes on your board.
Combat start: Experiments standing on Laboratory hexes gain the Experiment bonuses of all Experiments on Laboratory hexes, plus max Health.

name: Bruiser
desc: Your team gains @TeamFlatHealth@ max Health. Bruisers gain more.

name: Junker King
desc: Every @NumRounds1Star@ rounds, open an armory to purchase permanent upgrades to your strongest Rumble's mech.

name: Black Rose
desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) Summon a chained Sion. He is freed after @NumCastsToUnlock@ casts from Black Rose units or when he drops below @PercentHealthUnlock*100@% health.</row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) Sion grows stronger and his enemies take more damage from Black Rose units.</row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) Sion unleashes dark magic and heals to full Health when freed.</row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) When Sion dies, he restores to life with power beyond death!</row>
<rules>Each Black Rose champion's star level increases Sion's power</rules>

name: Quickstriker
desc: Quickstrikers move faster and gain Attack Speed, based on their target's missing Health.
<row>(@MinUnits@) @MinBonusAS*100@-@MaxBonusAS*100@% %i:scaleAS%. On target death, Quickstrikers dash to a new target and gain @ShieldAmount@ shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. </row>

name: Geniuses
desc: When Heimerdinger casts, Ekko releases @NumEkkoAfterImages@ afterimages, each dealing @ReducedEkkoDamage*100@% damage. When Ekko casts, Heimerdinger fires @NumHeimerMissiles@ missiles, each dealing @ReducedHeimerDamage*100@% damage.

name: Watcher
desc: Watchers gain Durability, increased while above @HealthBreakpoint*100@% Health.
